title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Pendant Haaram - Adorable Vaddanam Style
materials: Round-cut Rubies (approximately 8.61 carats total weight) South Sea Pearl (approximately 7.60 carats). Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite haaram features a delicate floral design with interwoven diamond-studded heart shapes. Centered on the necklace are two oval shaped emeralds and two round cut rubies in the floral design. The pendant showcases a larger pear-shaped Emerald encompassed in a diamond and floral design, finishing with a dangling South Sea pearl at the bottom. The openwork design allows light to play beautifully with the gemstones, enhancing their brilliance.
occasions: or any special occasion where you desire a touch of contemporary elegance and traditional charm. Suitable for modern brides or as a statement piece for celebratory events.
description: A seamless blend of tradition and modernity. The floral design with a South Sea pearl is a classic symbol of beauty, prosperity, and new beginnings. The impeccable Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees lasting value and brilliance. The unique design makes it a valuable addition to any fine jewelry collection and a perfect heirloom piece.
